sentence.Network_en: The language of Darwin was intelligible to experts and non-experts alike.
sentence.Network_cn: 达尔文的语言无论对专家还是非专业人士而言都明白易懂。

sentence.Network_en: Non-violence and patience are the central tenets of their faith.
sentence.Network_cn: 非暴力和忍耐是他们的信仰的核心原则。

sentence.Network_en: The constitution prohibits them from military engagement on foreign soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 宪法禁止他们在外国采取军事行动。
